text:
Rumah’s Solidarity Project
.
A guerilla-style digital project showcasing a collection of monologues from Singapore Malay plays.
.
Rumah’s Solidarity Project is a guerilla-style digital project that aims to introduce Singapore Malay theatre works to a newer and larger audience. .
Find out more at https://www.apart.sg/theatre/rumah-solidarity-project
.
#TogetherapARTsg #apARTsgSeason7 | @rumah.khai
